 This pointer should be set by the driver or client code to specify the treatment at the advection boundary condition.
subroutine neumann_advective_flux (flux_lo, flux_hi, conc_lo, conc_hi, flow_lo, flow_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dt, dx)
 Example advective flux that imposes Neumann boundaries with zero flux at both ends of the channel.

Detailed Description

boundary advection interface to be fulfilled by driver or application

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine boundary_advection_module.neumann_advective_flux ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  flux_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  flux_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  flow_hi,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx 
)

Example advective flux that imposes Neumann boundaries with zero flux at both ends of the channel.

Parameters:
flux_lo flux on lo side of cell, time centered
flux_hi flux on hi side of cell, time centered
conc_lo concentration extrapolated to lo face
conc_hi concentration extrapolated to hi face
flow_lo flow on lo side of cells centered in time
flow_hi flow on hi side of cells centered in time
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time Current time
dt Time step
dx Spatial step

subroutine boundary_advection_module.uninitialized_advection_bc ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  flux_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(inout)  flux_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  flow_hi,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx 
)

This pointer should be set by the driver or client code to specify the treatment at the advection boundary condition.

Example uninitialize that prints an error and bails

Parameters:
flux_lo flux on lo side of cell, time centered
flux_hi flux on hi side of cell, time centered
conc_lo concentration extrapolated to lo face
conc_hi concentration extrapolated to hi face
flow_lo flow on lo side of cells centered in time
flow_hi flow on hi side of cells centered in time
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time Current time
dt Time step
dx Spatial step
